duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide compassionate care and clinical assessment to patients in the adult acute or critical care float pools.
Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams and advocate for patient needs.
Administer medications and ensure accurate documentation of patient care.
Maintain physical stamina to meet the demands of standing for prolonged periods and lifting heavy weights.
Demonstrate critical thinking and team collaboration in fast-paced, high-pressure situations.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an accredited nursing program. Bachelor of Science in Nursing required within 5 years of hire.
